description: This table provides general information on changes to specified no-add items in the order (ORD) master file.  The detail item information is saved in AUDIT_ORD_RXITEMS table.

columns.name: ORDER_MED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the medication order (prescription) record. NOTE: This is an internal unique identifier for ORD master file records in this table and cannot be used to link to CLARITY_MEDICATION.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for each change.

columns.name: AUDIT_EMP_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique user ID who made the change.

columns.name: AUDIT_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The action category to cause the change.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Rx Verify


Admin Instruction Change


Rate Change


Order Duration Change


Order Modified


Multistep


Orders Correction Utility


Adjust Times for Linked Orders


Patient Transfer


Pharmacy Review


Prescription Transfer


Prescription Refill


Deferred


Signed & Held Modification


Rx FAM Autoverify


Order Transmittal


RIS Change Order


Automated adjustment due to Inventory


Adjust Times


Rx Autoverify


Notification Requests Modified


Automatic End Time Adjustment on Administration


SmartForm Change


Original Provider Change


Administration Responsibility Change


Prescription Transfer Canceled


Sign Order


Order Released


Automatic Adjustment on Prescription Fill


Provider Hold Action


Automatic Order Substitution


Automatic Prescription Expiration Date Update

columns.name: AUDIT_OTX_PASS_NUM
columns.description: This item records the number of the order transmittal pass.
